bientity_condition.description: If specified, this condition type will only evaluate to true if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, this condition type will only evaluate to true if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the '*_actor_*' and '*_target_*' entities.

type.description:
## Riding --- [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/riding) Checks whether the '__actor__' entity is directly riding the '__target__' entity. Type ID: `origins:riding` --- ### üìù Note In the context for this entity condition type, the '__actor__' entity is the passenger and the entity that invoked the condition while the '__target__' entity is the entity that is being ridden. --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:riding" } ``` This example will check if the '__actor__' entity is riding an entity.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:riding", "bientity_condition": { "type": "origins:target_condition", "condition": { "type": "origins:entity_type", "entity_type": "minecraft:minecart" } } } ``` This example will check if the '__actor__' entity is currently riding a minecart ('__target__' entity).
type.markdownDescription:
## Riding --- [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/riding) Checks whether the '__actor__' entity is directly riding the '__target__' entity. Type ID: `origins:riding` --- ### üìù Note In the context for this entity condition type, the '__actor__' entity is the passenger and the entity that invoked the condition while the '__target__' entity is the entity that is being ridden. --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:riding" } ``` This example will check if the '__actor__' entity is riding an entity.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:riding", "bientity_condition": { "type": "origins:target_condition", "condition": { "type": "origins:entity_type", "entity_type": "minecraft:minecart" } } } ``` This example will check if the '__actor__' entity is currently riding a minecart ('__target__' entity).

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Riding (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-07

Riding

Entity Condition Type

Checks whether the 'actor' entity is directly riding the 'target' entity.

Type ID: origins:riding

!!! note

In the context for this entity condition type, the '**actor**' entity is the passenger and the entity that invoked the condition while the '**target**' entity is the entity that is being ridden.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition Type optional If specified, this condition type will only evaluate to true if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the 'actor' and 'target' entities.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:riding"
}

This example will check if the 'actor' entity is riding an entity. 

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:riding",
    "bientity_condition": {
        "type": "origins:target_condition",
        "condition": {
            "type": "origins:entity_type",
            "entity_type": "minecraft:minecart"
        }
    }
}

This example will check if the 'actor' entity is currently riding a minecart ('target' entity).
